thread.title: Super Bowl Has Lady Gaga & Puppy Bowl Halftime Has 'Kitty Gaga': Watch a Preview
thread.title_full: Super Bowl Has Lady Gaga & Puppy Bowl Halftime Has 'Kitty Gaga': Watch a Preview

author: Jillian Frankel
title: Super Bowl Has Lady Gaga & Puppy Bowl Halftime Has 'Kitty Gaga': Watch a Preview
text:
Courtesy of Animal Planet Kitty Gaga performs "Puparazzi" during the Puppy Bowl XIII halftime show. 
Impossibly cute kittens will be scratching records instead of scratching up furniture during this year’s Puppy Bowl XIII halftime show performance. 
The Chicago Rock Cats -- led by Kitty Gaga, of course -- will perform “Puparazzi” at the Arm & Hammer Clump & Seal Kitty Halftime Show. The feline musicians will be playing guitar and Kitty Gaga will don a vegan meat dress as she meows the lyrics. 
Puppy Bowl XIII starts Sunday at 3 p.m. ET/noon PT on Animal Planet. 
Meanwhile, Lady Gaga will headline the Super Bowl halftime show Sunday night on Fox -- if you can turn the channel away from the baby animals.
